name: uibuilder/Simple Example
info:
[Front-End](/uib_simple)

This flow gets a "quote of the day" from the Internet and passes it
to uibuilder. It caches the result so that if you reload the page,
you get the last result back. The quote is updated every 30 minutes
during the day and evening.

"Simple" refers to the front-end code. While the flow looks a little
complex, it really isn't. A trigger (repeating), an Internet request,
a cache and uibuilder. The link nodes loop the control output from
uibuilder back to the cache.

## Configuration

Update the files:

* `index.html`
* `index.js`
* `index.css`

According to the example(s) in the 3 other comment nodes in this example.

Press the button on the trigger to start the flow.
